tool_description: Search over 200,000 creative recipes. This API allows users to find recipes based on specific search queries, making it easy to discover new dishes.

api_list.name: /v1/recipe
api_list.description: Get a list of recipes for a given search query. Returns at most 10 results. To access more than the first 10 results, use the offset parameter to paginate through results.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The text to search for recipes.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip for pagination.
